short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lincaro is an extension for Salesforce

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lincaro helps sales teams using SalesForce find the perfect reference customer for the lead they are working with. 
It connects the lead and reference customer on a call to answer the prospects questions for the current customer. Prospect or customer doesn't have time for a call? No problem, the prospect can write the questions they have, the customer will receive the questions and can record video response to their questions.
